forceTypeInUseOrToExpect.description:
Force indicator code In Use or Effective
  • 0 - From path
  • 1 - In use
  • 2 - As of

updateInsertPriceList.description: Update or create period price lists

updatePriceList.description: Update Price Lists included in the period (Update last update date and flag changed)

forceTypeUnitOfMeasure.description:
Force Type Unit of measurement
  • 1 - UM1 (All items)
  • 2 - UM2 (All items)
  • 3 - UM1 (new items only)
  • 4 - UM2 (new items only)
  • 5 - UMCF (All items)
  • 2 - UMCF (new items only)
